components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,EQUIPMENT
summary: DEFECTIVE BRAKE ROTORS ON 2001 SATURN SL.  *MR   FRONT BRAKE PADS AND ROTORS HAD TO BE REPLACED 4 TIMES.  INTERMITTENTLY VEHICLE BUCKED AND STALLED AT IDLE.  DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE CONCERN ON ROAD TEST.  RADIO LIGHT INOPERATIVE.  RADIO ASSEMBLY REPLACED.  *TT  *JB
